dct_title_s: Hiroshima-ken kannai chizu: fu Hiroshima shigai zenzu; Sō Mōkan.; Kaisei Hiroshima-ken kannai chizu kan;Hiroshima-ken kannai chizu
dct_description_sm: Mounted cover title. Copperplate print. In Japanese. Relief shown by hachures. Includes 1 inset map of Hiroshima-shi, distance chart, and diagrammatic chart of distances between postal stations by rail. Includes legend. 1 map: col.; 71 x 71 cm., folded in cover 19 x 13 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
